channel.title: App on Pepware

item.title: So You Want to Build an App?
item.description: So you’ve got an idea for an app that you think needs to exist. Or not, but in any case, you want some info on what to do with said idea. What things need to happen to make your idea exist? There are two major questions that you need to consider: Who is going to make it? What do you want your app to do? Let’s start by answering the first question.
